title: Adventures with Abuela
description: In Adventures with Abuela, the Cruz children and their parents set out to discover where they'll be meeting their grandmother, Abuela, for vacation. Armed with a map of Arizona and their grandmother's clues, the children unravel a mystery that takes them from Utah to Arizona.
